[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@threebird/controls](./controls.md) &gt; [DamperProps](./controls.damperprops.md)

## DamperProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DamperProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dampingFactor](./controls.damperprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | Multiplier used on each update to approach the target value, should be between 0 and 1, where 1 is no damping |
|  [epsilon?](./controls.damperprops.epsilon.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Amount of permitted error before a value is considered to have 'reached' its target. Defaults to 0.001 |
|  [values](./controls.damperprops.values.md) | [DamperValues](./controls.dampervalues.md) | Values to be dampened |
